boundary.title: Integration Boundary Model
boundary.description: The UI consumes a canonical contract defined in Appendix A. The integration boundary cleanly separates presentation logic from data provision. Any production data provider that conforms to the Appendix A schema can replace the demo mock layer without requiring UI, logic, or component modifications.
principles: UI consumes canonical Appendix A contract — no provider-specific logic in presentation layer
Mock data provider is structurally identical to production provider interface
Schema validation at the boundary ensures contract compliance regardless of data source
Provider swap requires configuration change only — zero code modification in UI layer
All integration interfaces are versioned and backward-compatible by contract
